Free Text: List all products that were purchased between January 1, 2021 and June 1, 2021
SQL: "SELECT DISTINCT products.name FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id WHERE purchases.date_created BETWEEN "2021-01-01" AND "2021-06-01";"

Free Text: List all products that were purchased between the beginning of January 2021 and the beginning of June, 2021
SQL: "SELECT DISTINCT products.name FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id WHERE purchases.date_created BETWEEN "2021-01-01" AND "2021-06-01";"
Notes: Using English words instead of exact dates

Free Text: List all products that were purchased between Jan 2021 and Jun 2021
SQL: "SELECT DISTINCT products.name FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id WHERE purchases.date_created BETWEEN "2021-01-01" AND "2021-06-01";"
Notes: Even fuzzier. Abbreviate months and don't specify day
